original_title: Kees Torn: Doe Mee en Win
overview: In his sixth comedy show the Dutch comedian Kees Torn tells that his impresario no longer allows him to talk about his girlfriend, his love for cigars and whiskey. That's why he's only talking about politicians, television personalities and important things like the QWERTY keyboard layout.
title: Kees Torn: Doe Mee en Win
